The Blockchain Association

USA | Related people:
  • Kristin Smith (CEO)
The Blockchain Association is a cryptocurrency industry group focused on lobbying for friendly regulatory policies. Its members include Andreessen Horowitz, Ark Invest, Blockchain Capital, Circle, Coinbase, Digital Currency Group, Jump Trading, Kraken, Multicoin Capital, Paradigm, Ripple, and Union Square Ventures.
